/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, filled with cars and buses, weaves its way through the heart of the city, flanked by trees and buildings on either side. The sky overhead is a blanket of gray, hinting at an overcast day. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the urban environment and the natural elements within it.
